title: What is technology in teaching and learning? - Quora

response.answer_text: Its using some innovation in the process of mostly teaching but can also be learning to improve the outcome/s. Since we are living in the digital age we call them technological innovations. At EdSoft apart from many new ideas, we are using an Agile language interface that converts the user interface and the text chat into the native language of the user automatically and converts them into different languages set by the participants. This removes the block of language barrier, improves the understand! As 1 example. Vijaykumar Chavda Hope you got some idea of the concept!
